name: América Móvil, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: América Móvil, S.A.B. de C.V. is a leading telecommunications company based in Mexico, recognized as one of the largest mobile network operators in the world. Founded in 2000 by Carlos Slim Helú, the company has expanded its operations across Latin America, the United States, and parts of Europe. América Móvil offers a wide range of services including wireless voice and data services, fixed-line telephony, broadband, and digital television. The company's extensive network infrastructure supports millions of subscribers, making it a crucial player in the telecommunications landscape. América Móvil is committed to innovation and customer service, continuously enhancing its offerings through advanced technology and strategic partnerships. The company also invests in expanding its 4G and 5G networks, ensuring robust connectivity for its users. In addition to telecommunications, América Móvil is involved in various sectors including media, retail, and technology. The company's mission is to enhance the quality of life of its customers through comprehensive communication solutions, while promoting digital inclusion across the regions it serves.

faq.answer: América Móvil is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.
